channel.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317] FINISHED!
channel.description: Okay I Need Help Adding Actions To My Quest Tab, I Know Where To Change The Text Now "TextHandler.java" And I Know "ClickingMost.java" Is For Action's... But How Would I Build A Quest Tab Like This? Quest Tab: [code]Players Online: 56 (FINISHED) Staff Status: Owner (HELP!) Donor Status: Donor (HELP!) - - - - - - - - - - - - (FINISHED) Help (FINISHED) Rules (FINISHED) Donate (How Do I Get This To Open Up The Donating Link?) Commands (FINISHED) Information (FINISHED) [/code] HELP?!?! Please And Thank You. :)

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317] FINISHED!
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:2, topic:378742”]also place in your processes

c.sendQuest("@gre@Online:"+c.PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 7332); [/quote]What Do You Mean By That, THANKS ALOT FOR THE REST!
Also Your Code:

c.sendQuest("@gre@Online:"+c.PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 7332);

Didn’t Work So I Replaced With This:

c.sendQuest("@gre@Players Online: " + PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " ", 7332);

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA, 317] Quest Tab [DELTA, 317] FINISHED!
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Texthandler.java
Here is a snippet for you.

c.sendQuest("@gre@Online:"+c.PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 7332);
if (c.playerRights == 0) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Staff:No", 7333);
}
if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Staff:@cya@Mod", 7333);
}
if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Staff:@yel@Admin", 7333);
}
if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Staff:@ora@Owner", 7333);
}
if (c.Donator == 1) {
c.sendQuest("@gre@Donator: Yes", 7334);
} else {
c.sendQuest("@red@Donator: No", 7334);
}
c.sendQuest("-----------------------", 7336);
c.sendQuest("@gre@Help", 7383);
c.sendQuest("@gre@Rules", 7339);
c.sendQuest("@gre@Donate", 7338);//You can tell them the link you can't get it to open unless you know your client well.
//This isnt Server Sided.
c.sendQuest("@gre@Commands", 7340);
c.sendQuest("@gre@Extra Info", 7346);

also place in your processes

c.sendQuest("@gre@Online:"+c.PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 7332);

Read full topic

item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay I Need Help Adding Actions To My Quest Tab, I Know Where To Change The Text Now “TextHandler.java” And I Know “ClickingMost.java” Is For Action’s… But How Would I Build A Quest Tab Like This?
Quest Tab:

[code]Players Online: 56 (FINISHED)
Staff Status: Owner (HELP!)
Donor Status: Donor (HELP!)

                        • (FINISHED)

Help (FINISHED)
Rules (FINISHED)
Donate (How Do I Get This To Open Up The Donating Link?)
Commands (FINISHED)
Information (FINISHED)
[/code] HELP?!?!
Please And Thank You.
